definitions.title: vb. stir up strift, quarrel
definitions.body: (cf. [[גרה]])—so Ew Che Di RVm (Is 54:15); gather together Ges De Br cf. Targum Vulgate, so AV RV;—

definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גׇּר]] Is 54:15; Impf. [[יׇגוּר]] v:Is 54:15, [[יׇגוּרוּ]] Ps 56:7, Ps 59:4, Ps 140:3 (on all cf. infr.); Inf. abs. [[גּוֹר]] Is Is 54:15; —

stir up strife, abs. [[גּוֹר יׇגוּר]] Is 54:14; cf. Ps 56:7(but AE Che rd. [[יׇגוֹדּוּ]] attack, v. [[גדד]]); sq. [[עַל־]] Ps 59:4 (but Che id.; cf. Ps 94:21, wh. however Ol would emend by Ps 56:7, Ps 59:4); sq. acc. [[מִלְחָמוֹת]] Ps 140:3 (Hup Che rd. [[יְגׇרוּ]] Pi. Impf. of [[גרה]])
quarrel, sq. [[אֶת־]] with Is 54:15. Here also

definitions.title: Hithpol.
definitions.body: Impf. Ho 7:14 [[יִתְגּוֹâָררוּ]] (cf. I. [[גור]]), acc. to Ew, they excite themselves, but unlikely; v. [[גדד]].
